languages.text: "На корабли Винтерскейла идет охота, его миры оккупируют под предлогом подчинению Имперскому кредо. Удивительно, но, при всей своей любви к драке, Винтерскейл не спешит на защиту своих владений. Согласно перехваченным астропатическим сообщениям, он со свитой пребывает на мире Кетца Темер, где ведет охоту на флот ксеносов-эльдаров".

traits.locale_text: "На корабли Винтерскейла идет охота, его миры оккупируют под предлогом принуждения к подчинения Имперскому Кредо. Удивительно, но, при всей своей любви к драке, Винтерскейл не спешит на защиту своих владений. Согласно перехваченным астропатическим сообщениям, он со свитой пребывает на мире Кетца Темер, где ведет охоту на флот ксеносов-эльдаров".

languages.text: "Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretence of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."
languages.original_text: "На корабли Винтерскейла идет охота, его миры оккупируют под предлогом подчинению Имперскому кредо. Удивительно, но, при всей своей любви к драке, Винтерскейл не спешит на защиту своих владений. Согласно перехваченным астропатическим сообщениям, он со свитой пребывает на мире Кетца Темер, где ведет охоту на флот ксеносов-эльдаров".

traits.locale_text: "Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretext of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. As surprising as it is, considering his fondness for fights, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to astropathic messages we intercepted, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer, hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by the looks of it."

"Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretext of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. As surprising as it is, considering his fondness for fights, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to astropathic messages we intercepted, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer, hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by the looks of it."

According to intercepted astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."

Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."

"Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretence of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."

languages.text: «Las naves de Winterscale están siendo perseguidas y sus mundos ocupados con el pretexto de obligarles a someterse al Credo imperial. Lo sorprendente es que, pese al afán por luchar que le caracteriza, Winterscale no parece interesado en defender sus dominios. Los mensajes astropáticos que hemos interceptado sugieren que Winterscale y su séquito se encuentran en Quetza Temer dando caza a una flota xenos. Aeldari, según parece».
languages.original_text: "Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretence of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."

traits.locale_text: «Las naves de Winterscale están siendo perseguidas y sus mundos ocupados con el pretexto de obligarles a someterse al Credo imperial. Lo sorprendente es que, pese al afán por luchar que le caracteriza, Winterscale no parece interesado en defender sus dominios. Los mensajes astropáticos que hemos interceptado sugieren que Winterscale y su séquito se encuentran en Quetza Temer dando caza a una flota xenos. Aeldari, según parece».

languages.text: “库尔达打着帝国的旗号，不断狩猎温特斯凯尔的舰船，占领他的领地，说要让那些人服从帝国的信仰。但令人意外的是，尽管温特斯凯尔酷爱战斗，但他并没有急于夺回领地。截获的星语讯息表明，他和他的随从目前正在格扎尔特默追捕某支异形舰队。种种迹象表明，那是一支艾达灵族的舰队。”
languages.original_text: "Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretence of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."

traits.locale_text: “库尔达打着帝国的旗号，不断狩猎温特斯凯尔的舰船，占领他的领地，说要让那些人服从帝国的信仰。但令人意外的是，尽管温特斯凯尔酷爱战斗，但他并没有急于夺回领地。截获的星语讯息表明，他和他的随从目前正在格扎尔特默追捕某支异形舰队。种种迹象表明，那是一支艾达灵族的舰队。”

languages.text: « Les vaisseaux de Winterscale sont pourchassés et ses mondes, occupés, sous prétexte de les obliger à se soumettre au Credo Impérial. Étonnamment, malgré sa passion pour le combat, Winterscale ne semble pas pressé de défendre son domaine. D'après les messages astropathiques que nous avons interceptés, il s'est rendu sur Quetza Temer pour y traquer une flotte xénos... Des Aeldaris, apparemment. »
languages.original_text: "Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretence of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."

traits.locale_text: « Les vaisseaux de Winterscale sont pourchassés et ses mondes, occupés, sous prétexte de les obliger à se soumettre au Crédo Impérial. Étonnamment, malgré sa passion pour le combat, Winterscale ne semble pas pressé de défendre son domaine. D'après les messages astropathiques que nous avons interceptés, il s'est rendu sur Quetza Temer pour y traquer une flotte xénos... Des Aeldaris, apparemment. »

languages.text: 「ウィンタースケールの船は追われ、帝国信条集に服従させるという名目で彼の惑星は占領されています。意外なことに、戦いを好むウィンタースケールにしては、自分の領地を守ることに急いてはいないのです。傍受された感応通信官のメッセージによると、彼と彼の従者は現在ケツァ・テメルでゼノの艦隊を追い詰めているそうです ― その相手は、どうやらアエルダリのようです」
languages.original_text: "Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretence of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィンタースケールの船は追われ、帝国信条集に服従させるという名目で彼の惑星は占領されています。意外なことに、戦いを好むウィンタースケールにしては、自分の領地を守ることに急いてはいないのです。傍受された感応通信官のメッセージによると、彼と彼の従者は現在ケツァ・テメルでゼノの艦隊を追い詰めているそうです ― その相手は、どうやらアエルダリのようです」

languages.text: "Winterzunders Schiffe werden gejagt und seine Welten werden besetzt, alles unter dem Vorwand, man müsse ihn zwingen, sich dem Imperialen Glauben zu unterwerfen. Überraschenderweise macht Winterzunder, der sonst doch das Kämpfen so liebt, keinerlei Anstalten, sein Reich zu verteidigen. Abgefangenen astropathischen Nachrichten zufolge jagen er und sein Gefolge momentan auf Quetza Temer eine Xenos-Flotte — Aeldari, offenbar."
languages.original_text: "Winterscale's ships are being hunted and his worlds occupied under the pretence of compelling them to submit to the Imperial Creed. Surprisingly, for all his love of fighting, Winterscale is in no hurry to defend his domain. According to intercepted Astropathic messages, he and his retinue are currently on Quetza Temer hunting down a xenos fleet — Aeldari, by all appearances."
